rules_text:
[i]Valaskjálf – [/i]At the beginning of your end step, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it. If you reveal a legendary creature card this way, put it onto the battlefield tapped under your control and lose life equal to its mana value.
[i]Emblian Blood[/i] – {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Return Bruno, Prince of Emblia, from your graveyard to the battlefield.
